Uses of Class
poker.Card

    • Uses of Card in poker

      Fields in poker with type parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> Player.playerCards
      A list of the cards the player holds, between their hand and the table
      Methods in poker that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Card[] Hand.getCards()
      Returns the cards in the hand
      Card[] HoleCards.getCards()
      Return the cards that make up the pocket card
      Card[] Player.getPocketArray()
      Returns the player's HoleCards as an array
      Methods in poker that return types with arguments of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> Deck.getCards()
      Returns a copy of the list of cards
      Methods in poker with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Range.deadCard​(Card c)
      Removes all hands containing a card (that we know cannot be in the range, since it is on the table or in another hand) from the range.
      static Hand Hand.findBestHandSeven​(Card[] cards)
      Returns the best possible hand that can be made from 7 cards.
      static Hand Hand.findBestHandSix​(Card[] cards)
      Returns the best possible hand that can be made from 6 cards.
      static long Hand.valueHand​(Card[] cardsInHand)
      Finds the exact relative value of the 5-card hand.
      Constructors in poker with parameters of type Card 
      Constructor Description
      Deck​(Card[] exclude)
      Constructs a deck without some specified cards.
      Hand​(Card[] c)
      Constructs the best five-card hand from the given cards.
      HoleCards​(Card[] c)
      A constructor that takes an array of the two cards and orders them
      HoleCards​(Card c1, Card c2)
      A constructor that gets the two cards and orders them
      Player​(Card[] held)
      Constructor from array of cards
      SimulateVsHand​(Player p1, Player p2, Card[] table)
      Constructor for a 2 player situation
      SimulateVsHand​(Player p1, Player p2, Player p3, Card[] table)
      Constructor for a 3 player situation
      SimulateVsHand​(Player p1, Player p2, Player p3, Player p4, Card[] table)
      Constructor for a 4 player situation
      SimulateVsRange​(Player p1, RangePlayer p2, Card[] table)
      Constructs a given hand vs range simulation for a certain board
